inicio.texto-nosotros: In 2004, the consulting engineer with a Master's degree in Soil Mechanics, Oscar Osvaldo Jir√≥n Boza, seeing the need that Nicaragua had, in the field of engineering, to technically and quantitatively develop the branch of geotechnical studies and materials of construction, founded the engineering company Geotecnia de Nicaragua (GEONIC), which is a company that generally carries out engineering studies and provides research services in the field of geology and geotechnics.
